title: Milei Carves Path for Savers to Stop Stashing Cash Under Couches
description: After decades of financial crises, Argentines tend to keep their money just about anywhere except a bank — under the couch, dug in the backyard or in bulletproof bunkers. One ex-politician famously stashed cash at his local convent. The nuns helped out.
content: After decades of financial crises, Argentines tend to keep their money just about anywhere except a bank — under the couch, dug in the backyard or in bulletproof bunkers. One ex-politician famously stashed cash at his local convent. The nuns helped out.
